description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Lander Mania, an exciting single or multi-player game, where each player racks up points by landing their ship safely. Rotate your ship and fire your thrusters to get the perfect speed and angle or you will crash! Battle your friends for the top of the scoreboard, by bashing into them and getting to the landing pads first! (description written by Lord Geoff at pregamelobby.com)
description.short: Welcome to Lander Mania, an exciting single or multi-player game, where each player racks up points by landing their ship safely.
